title: U.S. DHS Football Fanatics Investigations at UN CONVENTION FOR THE RIGHTS OF A CHILD or USA PATRIOT ACT!

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records to be forthwith, henceforth *UNSEALED* in due haste with due process at discretionary measures taken by U.S. Federal Appellate Court Administrative Judges Chambers... 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Convention_on_the_Rights_of_the_Child

https://www.ohchr.org/en/instruments-mechanisms/instruments/convention-rights-child

... For release in a timely fashion of matters pertaining to U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) and so-called USA PATRIOT ACT or otherwise regarded as United Nations Peacekeeping Forces UN CONVENTION ON THE RIGHTS OF A CHILD enacted or exacted penile servitude related co-jointly launched investigatory actions taken by U.S. Department of Homeland Security front company FOOTBALL or ICESCAPADES FANATICS, INK. or synonymously Football Fanatics, Inc. of Lake Tahoe.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fanatics,_Inc.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

HM Elizabeth Sherry
